titles.title: National Forest Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2015
National Forest Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2015
National Forest Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2015
To reauthorize the National Forest Foundation Act, and for other purposes.
National Forest Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 114-138.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 98.

action.text: Mr. Thompson (PA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2394.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on June 4, 2015. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
National Forest Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2015
This bill amends the National Forest Foundation Act to authorize the Department of Agriculture to provide during FY2016-FY2018 matching funds for certain administrative and project expenses incurred by the National Forest Foundation.
